__e: Well, anybody who ever built an empire or changed the world sat where you are right now.
You know how he... he always goes on about he came from nothin', and he built an empire.
I've done a lot of things in my life. Practically built an empire with your mother from the ground up.
My dad built me a best friend?
I still can't believe you built another one.
You know, someone, a good friend, actually, told me I had a big wall around me.
Made his name working with terrorists.
Well, seeing as my family and I lived here, built the place, in fact...
And that is what this country is built on.
But that's not how we built this country.
The people who... built the bomb.
Well, maybe she made the bomb somewhere else.
Maybe this is all about you feeling guilty about building the bomb that blew up her friends.
I have built my whole life around you.
Made my life all about me, not about him.
My God, Dad, she and I built my engine together.
It's where they built the machine that sent me here...
I was going to come give you this big speech about how we've been... friends for a long time and built up trust, that whole thing.
But you, dad, you built your life... and mine on your own.
So... you built this place for your daughter?
Your mother and I built this place with our bare hands.
As far as I'm concerned, you're no better than the people that built this place.
As far as I'm concerned, you're no better than the people that built this place.
Anyway, the school can't be that bad, they've just built this.
You have built this world... you and your kind.
My father built you a house.
How come you guys haven't built your own house up here?
I'll build a house, just like yours!
I can't believe you built a bomb.
How could you even think that she could make a bomb or... or kill somebody?
I was gone for five minutes. You built a bomb?
Built a life on a dead man's name.
You built a family, but none of it is real.
You carved out a nice little life for yourself here, didn't you?
- You don't have to live the life that your parents made for you.
They built you to do what you were told.
It's the thing I spent my whole life building.
